sources.autograph: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, D.I.33, 'Sonata a quattro no. 3 . . .' (separate part)
sources.ms_copies_score: Lucca, Istituto Musicale Boccherini, B.I. 114, 'Sonata a quattro no. 3 . . .'
ms_copies_parts: Montecatini, Venturi private collection, A.9, 'Quartetto no. 3 . . .'

entries.notes: Note on autograph: (for comment, see No. 159)

continues_from_previous.partial_info: Arrangements section continues from previous entry: (A) Of the whole quartet, as a sonata for harpsichord (or pianoforte or harp) and violin, perhaps by Naderman, c. 1778 (see No. 43). (B) Of the third movement, as part of a sonata for harpsichord (or pianoforte) and violin, by 'Mlle Le Jeune', c. 1785 (see No. 46).
